GameClient - Class in core
The GameClient class is an extension of the Thread class that represents an individual client.
GameClient(String, Socket) - Constructor for class core.GameClient
Initialize the GameClient using the client socket and creating both input and output streams.
GamePacket - Class in utility
GamePacket sent by the server.
GamePacket(short) - Constructor for class utility.GamePacket
 
GamePacketStream - Class in utility
The GamePacketStream contain methods that pushes the response information as bytes into the output stream.
GameRequest - Class in networking.request
The GameRequest class is an abstract class used as a basis for storing request information.
GameRequest() - Constructor for class networking.request.GameRequest
 
GameRequestTable - Class in metadata
The GameRequestTable class stores a mapping of unique request code numbers with its corresponding request class.
GameRequestTable() - Constructor for class metadata.GameRequestTable
 
GameResponse - Class in networking.response
The GameResponse class is an abstract class used as a basis for storing response information.
GameResponse() - Constructor for class networking.response.GameResponse
 
GameServer - Class in core
The GameServer class serves as the main module that runs the server.
GameServer() - Constructor for class core.GameServer
Create the GameServer by setting up the request types and creating a connection with the database.
GameServerConf - Class in configuration
The GameServerConf class stores important variables such as the port number to be used for the server from the configuration file.
GameServerConf() - Constructor for class configuration.GameServerConf
